Others: Baltimore Orioles were eliminated by the Kansas City Royals, continuing a string of frustrating postseason defeats.
It's the second consecutive year that Baltimore has been beaten in their first playoff series.
Orioles offense failed to show up, losing 1-0 and 2-1 in the two games.
Baltimore has now dropped 10 consecutive playoff games, moving them up in an unfortunate group in baseball history.
Only the 2004-2020 Minnesota Twins (18), the 1986-1995 Orioles (13), the 1915-1976 Phillies (11), the 1958-1991 Braves, and 1980-1985 Royals (10) have lost 10 consecutive playoff games or more.
